Class SignDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.impl.SignDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignDAO

    public class SignDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements SignDAO
    A DAO class uses to read or change data in database and send it to the modal layer.
